item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Temple Grill

Temple is one of the few eateries/bars in New Haven with a spacious outdoor patio downtown, so come out and enjoy the (hopefully) pleasant summer weather!

Temple will plan on putting out free appetizers for a crowd of 20+, so if you think you might come, please RSVP 'yes' or 'maybe'.

Drink specials are as follows:

- $3 domestic beers
- $3.50 imported beers
- $5 wine (glass)
- $5 "John Daly"

Special thanks to NHC member Ross for setting up and serving as the contact for this happy hour. If you get lost, have questions, etc., he can be reached at 203-980-5184.
item.name: Monday Happy Hour at Temple Grill
